akn:content.akn:p:
§ 220109. Duty to maintain corporate status The corporation shall maintain its status as a corporation incorporated under the laws of New York, another State, or the District of Columbia. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1461.)
